string.name: stay_home
string.font: Don’t leave your house if you don’t feel well. The virus spreads mostly through droplets that people send out when they talk, sneeze, or cough

string.name: Symptoms
string.font: if you feel a little bit unwell like fever, cough or a sore throat or sneeze, consult with your health provider immediately.

string.name: mask
string.font: Masks should be used as part of a comprehensive strategy of measures to suppress transmission and save lives, it prevents from many viruses present in air particles

string.name: senit
string.font: senitizer can kill more than 99% of germs which you carry while putting hands on objects,rub senitizer on hands before/after touching any objects

string.name: hug
string.font: hug or hand shake can transfer gems and bacterias, so it can make you ill.

string.name: drink
string.font: honey has antibacterial proties and lemon has vit c together both will boost your degestion and immunity,drinking 1 glass of lukewarm water with 1 tablespoon honey and lemon can boost white blood cell efficiency to fight with infections
